item.title: Connecting to a headless Raspberry Pi without a network
item.description: When travelling, connecting to a Raspberry Pi can be problematic if you there is no wifi or a shared network available. I discovered this trick a few years ago whilst stuck in an airport lounge, and have been meaning to blog it for my future self. Until, a couple of weeks ago I faced the same challenge in an office where there was no network, or means to connect a headless RPi and debug some Python.
